imdb.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Vrains
imdb.plot: The theme for the new work is "Let's take one step forward and try it!" Yuusaku hates standing out, and at his school he doesn't. However, Yuusaku starts meeting others through duels, and starts moving forward.

episodes.title: Setting Off to the End
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the battle against Bohman, Yusaku was able to rescue the consciousnesses of everyone captured. However, Ai and the rest of the Ignis did not return, leaving Yusaku alone without his AI companion.

episodes.title: Claim of Responsibility
episodes.plot: Peace has once again returned to Den City, thanks to the efforts of Playmaker. Ai and Roboppy sneak onto a ship owned by SOL Technologies and attempt to contact Queen as part of their mysterious agenda.

episodes.title: Counterattack
episodes.plot: Ai sends a message to Yusaku that he has attacked Queen and SOL Technologies, leaving Yusaku confused about his former partner. Meanwhile, Revolver creates an AI named Pandor to assist him to destroying the last surviving Ignis.

episodes.title: Fight On Roboppy!
episodes.plot: Playmaker has made up his mind to fight against Ai, regardless of the past they have together. While he battles copies of Ai, Blood Shepard and Ghost Girl come across Roboppy, who is ready to prove themselves.

episodes.title: Striking Down the Ogre
episodes.plot: Roboppy continues to give Blood Sheppard and Ghost Girl a hard time, forcing Ghost Girl to summon her new ace monster. Meanwhile, Go Onizuka tracks down the real Ai and begins a duel with him.

episodes.title: Indomitable Spirit
episodes.plot: Despite constantly being knocked down by Ai's strong monsters, Go is motivated by the kids from his orphanage and keeps standing up using his Gouki cards. Seeing Go's determination, Ai discusses what it feels like to lose one's friends.

episodes.title: The One Who Hunts the Ignises
episodes.plot: As Ai continues to target Yusaku's allies, he makes Akira his next target. Revolver sends Pandor to his aid to prevent the rogue Ignis from succeeding in his goal.

episodes.title: The Annoyance of Sympathy
episodes.plot: Ai discovers Akira and Aoi in the network and challenges them to a duel in order to gain control of SOL Technologies. Working together, the siblings start to fight off Ai.

episodes.title: Clashing Wills
episodes.plot: Akira and Blue Maiden manage to deal a heavy blow to Ai. Ai summons his new trump card, but the siblings continue to fight against their powerful foe.

episodes.title: The Fall of SOL
episodes.plot: Link VRAINS reopens all of a sudden, letting people log in again. Soulburner logs in to try and find some clues about Ai, but instead finds a strange island where Roboppy and a lot of household appliances live.

episodes.title: The King of Household Appliances
episodes.plot: The battle between Roboppy and Soulburner continues. Soulburner manages to hold off Roboppy's assault, but then the AI taunts him over the fact he was unable to protect Flame.

episodes.title: Dreaming Roboppy
episodes.plot: The battle between Roboppy and Soulburner continues. As he continues to fight, Roboppy thinks back on the nature of his existence and begins to break down.

episodes.title: Where It All Began
episodes.plot: Scrambled encourages kids to become totally involved in the action, both onscreen and at home.

episodes.title: Complete Combustion
episodes.plot: The duel between Revolver and Soulburner intensifies, taking to an unexpected outcome.

episodes.title: Paths That Won't Intersect
episodes.plot: The duel between Soulburner and Revolver reaches its conclusion.

episodes.title: A Reckless Proposal
episodes.plot: Soulburner and Revolver finish their brutal duel. Meanwhile, Playmaker prepares to confront Ai for the last time.

episodes.title: A Broken Ego
episodes.plot: The battle between Playmaker and Ai continues. Ai overpowers Playmaker with the power of his LINK 6 monster, forcing Playmaker to desperately fight back.

episodes.title: A Connected World
episodes.plot: The battle between Yusaku and Ai finally comes to its conclusion, with the fate of Link VRAINS and everyone inside of it hanging on the balance.

episodes.title: Playmaker Returns
episodes.plot: Peace has been restored to a new Link VRAINS despite Playmaker being a fugitive. AI discovers the Cyberse World destroyed while elsewhere a mysterious figure appears before Yusaku and Kusanagi.

episodes.title: Judgment Arrow
episodes.plot: Yusaku continues to chase after the mysterious Bohman, who stole the consciousness of Kusanagi's brother. Bohman plays a Link Spell that gives him a strong advantage over Yusaku.

episodes.title: Duelist Clad in Flames
episodes.plot: The enigmatic Soulburner and Flame appear to face Bit and Boot while Yusaku continues to chase Bohman. As Bit and Boot fuse, Soulburner fights back with his Salamangreat deck.

episodes.title: Transfer Student Takeru Homura
episodes.plot: Transfer student Takeru Homura reveals that he is Soulburner to Yusaku in the real world. He is allied with the Fire Ignis Flame and is a survivor of the Lost Incident. With the Cyberse World gone, they discuss an alliance.

episodes.title: Man Who Gave Up Charisma
episodes.plot: Playmaker and Soulburner follow a lead in Link VRAINS only to encounter Go Onizuka. Having sacrificed everything to become a bounty hunter, Onizuka demands to fight Yusaku only for Soulburner to intervene.

episodes.title: Hero in name only
episodes.plot: Go Onizuka continues to attack with his army of Dinowrestlers. Brokenhearted by seeing his hero like this, Soulburner recalls the Lost Incident and how it changed his life in more ways than one.

episodes.title: Bounty Hunter Blood Shepherd
episodes.plot: Just as Playmaker was about to reach the gate, he encounters the bounty hunter Blood Shepherd. Hired by SOL to hunt Playmaker and Ai, as well as fueled by a hatred of AIs, Blood Shepherd attacks Playmaker with his Battledrones.

episodes.title: Terrifying Battledrone
episodes.plot: Blood Shepherd continues to negate every move that Playmaker tries. When even Storm Access fails, Blood Shepherd reiterates his distrust of AIs. Yusaku and Ai have one final trick up their sleeve however.

episodes.title: To the Unknown World
episodes.plot: Playmaker and Soulburner enter the gate and appear in a mysterious world where they encounter the Wind Ignis, Windy. Unbeknownst to them, Ghost Girl and Aoi, now called Blue Girl, are following them.

episodes.title: Blue Girl's First Battle!
episodes.plot: Blue Girl and Soulburner begin their duel. Blue Girl does not really understand the nature of the Ignis and attacks with her upgraded Trickstars. Meanwhile, Playmaker continues to pursue Bohman.

episodes.title: Final Battle Above the Clouds
episodes.plot: Being given new memories by his benefactor, Bohman starts another duel against Playmaker with Jin's consciousness on the line. As Hydradrives and Cyberse collide, Bohman reveals some shocking information.

episodes.title: Soul of Replica
episodes.plot: Bohman claims that he is the real Yusaku Fujiki and that Playmaker is just a copy. As Playmaker and Ai ponder his claims, they continue to fight back against Bohman's Hydradrive strategy.

episodes.title: Hanoi Returns
episodes.plot: The Knights of Hanoi, thought disbanded, now decide to reunite to face a new threat. Revolver, allied with Specter, Faust, and Genome, aim to rescue to their comrade Baira.

episodes.title: Despair from Darkness
episodes.plot: Soulburner falls into the trap set by Blood Shepherd. As Yusaku contends with two bounty hunters, Blood Shepherd sifts through Soulburner's memories, including how he met Flame and the trauma from the Lost Incident.

episodes.title: Brave Max the Loser
episodes.plot: Ghost Girl and Aoi research Playmaker's identity and come to the conclusion that Brave Max, aka Naoki Shima, is a good lead. Meanwhile, Playmaker ponders the true nature of his new enemy.

episodes.title: The Ominous Ghost
episodes.plot: Playmaker continues to duel Kenmochi and Yoroizaka. Soulburner wakes up and begins a duel with Blood Shepherd. Shepherd's AI begins to explain the effects of all his cards, but that is only one piece of a devious plan.

episodes.title: Reincarnating Flame
episodes.plot: Blood Shepherd summons three copies of the monster that traumatized Soulburner. However, Soulburner had already faced his fear and performs a never before seen Reincarnation Link Summon to counter.

episodes.title: Turning Point
episodes.plot: Takeru becomes fascinated by Kusanagi and Yusaku, questioning how the two of them met. Kusanagi explains that his brother's trauma led him to investigating the Knights of Hanoi, which led to a chance meeting with Yusaku.

episodes.title: Playmaker's Breath
episodes.plot: In the past, Kusanagi and Playmaker agreed to team up to fight the Knights of Hanoi. Learning of a powerful deck of Cyberse cards, they travel to a pyramid in Link VRAINS to acquire their trump card.

episodes.title: Earth Ignis "Earth"
episodes.plot: Decoding a secret message on a forum, Yusaku and Ai discover the Earth Ignis, whom they dub Earth. Earth is not keen to trust humans based on what the Water Ignis said and tests Yusaku through a duel.

episodes.title: An AI's Yearning
episodes.plot: Armed with G Golem Crystal Heart, a card belonging to the Water Ignis Aqua, Earth continues to fight Yusaku. Hoping to convince Earth to join their side, Yusaku and Ai fight back fiercely.

episodes.title: Secret Meeting
episodes.plot: Ai is lured to a strange website where he encounters Windy and the Light Ignis, named Lightning. Lightning reveals that he has been the mastermind behind everything, hoping to supplant humans so the Ignis may rule.

episodes.title: A Mission That Must Be Accomplished
episodes.plot: Revolver comes to the aid of Playmaker, much to his shock. However, he is only here to accomplish his own mission of wiping out the Ignis once and for all. Thus he begins a duel with Windy.

episodes.title: Tuning Bullets
episodes.plot: The duel between Windy and his Stormriders and Revolver and his Rokkets continues. Windy gleefully reveals that he killed his partner and doesn't trust humans. A cold Revolver then does something unexpected

episodes.title: Declaration of War
episodes.plot: Lightning reveals that he stole Jin's consciousness and declares war with the human race so that Ignis may prevail. As they flee, Yusaku attempts to give chase only for Bohman to challenge him to another duel.

episodes.title: Absolute Perfection
episodes.plot: Bohman and Yusaku continue their duel. Bohman reveals his true purpose as a next generation AI who will be the first in a new line. His goal at hand, Bohman continues his assault.

episodes.title: The Blade of Light That Cuts Through Despair
episodes.plot: The battle between Bohman and Playmaker continues. Bohman uses Storm Access to acquire a Link 4 monster and dominate the field. Ai then reveals he has a plan to win the duel.

episodes.title: The Imprisoned Ignis
episodes.plot: Earth manages to locate Aqua, who was imprisoned by Lightning, and frees her. However, as they flee, Go Onizuka appears to capture the two Ignis for SOL Technologies, beginning a duel.

episodes.title: The Ogre Inside One's Heart
episodes.plot: Having saved Aqua, Earth continues his desperate battle with Go Onizuka. Enfused with an AI and a thirst for revenge, Onizuka begins a wild attack. Yusaku and the others hurry to where the Ignis are.

episodes.title: Awakened Memories
episodes.plot: SOL had captured Earth while Aqua was able to escape. Blood Shepherd is sent to hunt down Aqua, only to encounter Ghost Girl. Aoi discovers Aqua and learns about a secret connection that they share.

episodes.title: Brother and Sister in Conflict
episodes.plot: Ghost Girl tries to stop Blood Shepherd from going after Aoi by dueling him. With both of their accounts on the line, the siblings battle while unspoken words linger in the background.

episodes.title: The Rebellious Bounty Hunter
episodes.plot: Blood Shepherd continues with his goal on purging the Ignis for SOL. Revolver appears before him and offers an alliance, which Shepherd rejects. Chastising his recklessness, Revolver challenges him to a duel.

episodes.title: Blazing Fast Lightning
episodes.plot: Lightning perceives that his enemies are growing too quickly. He lures Blood Shepherd into a trap with the intent of adding him to their ranks. The defiant Blood Shepherd accepts his challenge and a duel begins.

episodes.title: A Bounty Hunter's Duty
episodes.plot: The duel between Blood Shepherd and Lightning continues. Armed with Judgment Arrows and his Armatos Legio deck, Lightning resumes a brutal attack on Blood Shepherd's drones.

episodes.title: The Summit That Has Been Reached
episodes.plot: Akira suspects that SOL has too far with fusing an AI into Go Onizuka's body. Armed with only his anger, Onizuka challenges Playmaker to a duel so that he can have his revenge once and for all.

episodes.title: That Which Lies Beyond Instinct
episodes.plot: Having absorbed Earth into himself, Onizuka uses the power of Crystal Heart and his Anti-Skill to push Playmaker into a corner. The odds are stacked against him as Yusaku and Ai make a move.

episodes.title: An Irregular Meeting
episodes.plot: Revolver invites Yusaku and his allies to a meeting to discuss the Ignis situation. He offers a team-up, but Soulburner cannot forgive Hanoi for the Lost Incident and lashes out at Revolver.

episodes.title: A Turbulent Past
episodes.plot: After Revolver accepts the responsibility for Soulburner's trauma, the gang agrees to a truce. They start heading to Mirror Link VRAINS, where Lightning's faction is gathered.

episodes.title: Genuine Tears
episodes.plot: Haru is tasked by Lightning to face Blue Maiden. Burdened by thoughts of his fake brother, Bohman, Haru appears before the group. Aoi and Aqua face him together in Blue Maiden's first duel.

episodes.title: Wisdom of the Have-Not
episodes.plot: As the gang gets separated, Lightning appears to duel Specter, whom he seems the weakest of the group. The deranged Specter accepts his challenge and a duel begins.

episodes.title: Chain Destruction
episodes.plot: Specter manages to steal Judgment Arrows and reverses Lightning's Extra Link. As Specter gloats about the power of Hanoi, Lightning's ice calm demeanor suddenly shatters.

episodes.title: Revenger Windy
episodes.plot: Windy, who is still bitter about his loss, challenges Soulburner to a duel. Belittling the power of teamwork, Windy and his Stormriders start an attack on Soulburner and Flame.

episodes.title: The Two Overlapping Flames
episodes.plot: The duel between Windy and Soulburner continues. Mocking the idea of humans and AI working together, he unleashes his ace monster. Soulburner and Flame are ready to prove him wrong and they counterattack.

episodes.title: Creator of the Next Generation
episodes.plot: Bohman appears before Blue Maiden, explaining how it is his destiny to create a new generation of AI. To stop his plans, Blue Maiden challenges him. However, Bohman is weirdly calm despite losing his brother.

episodes.title: The Proud Maiden
episodes.plot: Bohman and Blue Maiden continue their duel. Bohman continues to evolve and grow stronger, unleashing his Hydradrives. Nevertheless, Aoi and Aqua refuse to give up

episodes.title: The Ultimate Ordeal
episodes.plot: Lightning realizes he is at a disadvantage and contacts Kusanagi. Using Jin's life as leverage, he orders Kusanagi to duel against Playmaker. The former allies have no choice but to fight.

episodes.title: The Promise
episodes.plot: To save his brother, Kusanagi uses his knowledge of Yusaku's deck to completely lock down his moves. Yusaku is not eager to face his partner and friend, but cannot back down from Lightning's tricks.

episodes.title: Raging Soul
episodes.plot: Playmaker passes out after his battle with Kusanagi. Meanwhile, Bohman appears before Soulburner and Flame, hoping to add the Fire and Wind Ignis to his power. An angry Soulburner accepts his challenge.

episodes.title: The Phoenix's Radiance
episodes.plot: The duel between Bohman and Soulburner continues. Despite everything going on, Bohman's bravado will not waver as he taunts Soulburner. Refusing to give him, he and Flame plan a counterattack.

episodes.title: The Sin of Lightning
episodes.plot: Revolver encounters Lightning, who has been watching all of these events unfold. Challenging Lightning to a duel, Revolver decides to reveal Lightning's secret sin that sends him into a fit of rage.

episodes.title: The Plan to Unify the Ignises
episodes.plot: Revolver manages to gain the upper hand in his duel against Lightning, even summoning a new Borreload. As they fight, Lightning continues to explain his plan to unite the Ignis and Bohman's role in that plan.

episodes.title: AI That Has Crossed the Line
episodes.plot: To try and gain the upper hand against Revolver, Lightning uses Jin's life as a bargaining chip and reveals a dark secret about Dr. Kogami. Bohman, watching this unfold, decides that he cannot stand by.

episodes.title: Door of a New World
episodes.plot: Bohman absorbs the power of the Ignis and begins to warp the very nature of Link VRAINS itself, creating a powerful Data Storm. With the wills of his friends behind him, Yusaku prepares to fight Bohman one last time.

episodes.title: Twisted Utopia
episodes.plot: Bohman continues to use the consciousnesses of everyone trapped in Link VRAINS to maintain a Data Storm and a Hydradrive army. Yusaku can barely fight back when the three Knights of Hanoi arrive to assist.

episodes.title: Doubtless Instinct
episodes.plot: Everyone desperately continues fighting against Bohman's Neuron Link using everyone's consciousness data. Bohman is too powerful however and things seem hopeless for Yusaku as the duel goes on.

episodes.title: Entrusted Wishes
episodes.plot: Ai sacrifices himself to try and destroy Bohman's Neural Link, only to be absorbed. Yusaku is left to face Bohman, now with the power of all six Ignis. Things seem hopeless, but Yusaku refuses to give up.

episodes.title: My name is Playmaker
episodes.plot: In Den City, duels are held in the highly advanced VR world Link VRAINS, which is always under attack by the Knights of Hanoi. However, a hero named Playmaker has arrived to face the Knights, capturing a program they want called an Ignis.

episodes.title: Seize the Wind! Storm Access
episodes.plot: Playmaker continues his duel with the Knight of Hanoi using the new Speed Duel rules. Playmaker is backed into a corner by the Knight's Cracking Dragon, but a data storm soon envelopes the field and Playmaker activates his Skill.

episodes.title: First Contact
episodes.plot: Yusaku Fuiki, has become a celebrity in the aftermath of battling Hanoi. He continues to investigate the mysterious program he dubs "Ai." Meanwhile, SOL Technologies begins to look deeper into the identity of Playmaker.

episodes.title: Charisma Duelist Go Onizuka
episodes.plot: Go Onizuka, a popular duelist on Link VRAINS, accepts an offer from SOL to duel Playmaker. He wants to prove himself and he sees Playmaker as a powerful opponent. He lures Yusaku into a trap and a Speed Duel begins.

episodes.title: The Three Count Rings
episodes.plot: Despite taking huge amounts of damage, Go Onizuka keeps fighting and Link Summons his ace monster: Gouki the Great Ogre. Driving Playmaker into a tough corner, he aims to fight back against his strong opponent.

episodes.title: Idol!! Blue Angel
episodes.plot: Yusaku meets with Aoi Zaizen, the sister of Akira Zaizen, a higher up in SOL Technologies to gauge their threat. Aoi is a celebrity named Blue Angel who publicly challenges Playmaker to a duel. However, Hanoi lurks in the background.

episodes.title: Hanoi's Angel
episodes.plot: Blue Angel slowly begins whittling away Playmaker's Life Points using her Trickstar deck. Yusaku manages to fight back and Aoi is forced to use the mysterious card that the Knights of Hanoi gave her.

episodes.title: The One Who Commands the Wind
episodes.plot: Aoi is left in a coma after he duel with Yusaku. A grieving Akira lures Playmaker into a trap to get the program to heal her. That's when Revolver, Hanoi's leader appears, and challenges Yusaku to a duel with Aoi's fate on the line.

episodes.title: Enemy I Was Seeking
episodes.plot: Revolver gains the upper hand in his battle with Yusaku. Yusaku manages to fight back with his Link Summons, only for Revolver to reveal a shocking Skill.

episodes.title: Impact! Cyberse Vanishes
episodes.plot: The duel between Yusaku and Revolver ends in a draw. Being pulled into the center of the Data Storm, Revolver challenges Yusaku to another duel and aims to completely destroy Yusaku's Cyberse cards.

episodes.title: Roar of the Magazine Varreload
episodes.plot: Without his Cyberse cards, Yusaku can only barely hold back Revolver's relentless attack. Summoning his new ace monster, Revolver recounts the origin of Ai and his mission to wipe out all Cyberse from the world.

episodes.title: Impregnable Defending Dragon Firewall
episodes.plot: Yusaku and Revolver keep fighting using the strength of their ace monsters. Despite the odds against him, Yusaku recounts the incident that brought him to this point and steadies his resolve.

episodes.title: Battle Record
episodes.plot: Ghost Girl, a bounty hunter who works for SOL Technologies, holds an interview with two reporters recounting all the events that have transpired concerning the evil Knights of Hanoi and the mysterious Playmaker.

episodes.title: Ghost Girl's Invitation
episodes.plot: Ghost Girl challenges Yusaku to a Speed Duel with some heavy stakes. If she wins, she gets to capture Ai. If Yusaku wins, he gets a window into SOL's server to learn more about the incident that still haunts him.

episodes.title: Altergeist that Hides in the Darkness
episodes.plot: Even though her One-Turn Kill fails, Ghost Girl manages to put up a good fight against Yusaku. She uses her Altergeist deck to prevent Yusaku from using Storm Access, leaving him with less options to fight back.

episodes.title: Infiltrate SOL's Cyber Fortress
episodes.plot: Using the program he got from Ghost Girl, Yusaku hacks into SOL Technologies and heads towards the data bank. However, the head chief is onto him and sends two powerful AIs to halt his progress.

episodes.title: Flawless AI Duelist
episodes.plot: Blue Angel arrives to assist Playmaker in battling the AI duelists halting his progress. Even though Yusaku is forced to discard his entire hand in one turn, he refuses to give up until he learns the truth.

episodes.title: Wound Etched Into His Heart
episodes.plot: Playmaker arrives in the center of SOL's server only to encounter Akira. Having learned of the events that occurred ten years ago, he duels Playmaker to stop him from learning the truth.

episodes.title: The Incident Buried in the Darkness
episodes.plot: As Playmaker and Akira keep dueling, the true nature of the Lost Incident is made clear. After being kidnapped for 6 months and forced to a duel, Playmaker won't stop until he gets his revenge on those responsible.

episodes.title: Unyielding Justice
episodes.plot: Despite Akira's impassioned pleas, Yusaku will not abandon his quest for revenge. If he wants to finally learn the truth, he will need to break through Akira's Tindangle deck.

episodes.title: Embers of a New Battle
episodes.plot: AI recounts the events of everything that has happened to Yusaku's robot maid, Robopoppy. Elsewhere, the Knights of Hanoi execute their next gambit.

episodes.title: Blackened Sun
episodes.plot: Playmaker learns that avatars in Link VRAINS are being turned into agents for Hanoi, leaving their bodies comatose. Onizuka, losing his friend to this process, tracks down the one responsible.

episodes.title: Genome's Giant
episodes.plot: Go Onizuka fights Dr. Genome, the head of the Another project, with Playmaker's identity on the line. Against Genome's Helixx deck, the honorable Onizuka suddenly puts on a new persona.

episodes.title: Dark Mask's Burden of Fate
episodes.plot: Even with his heel persona of Dark Mask, Onizuka has trouble fighting against Genome and winning the anti virus program. When all seems lost, Playmaker arrives to encourage Onizuka to fight.

episodes.title: Virus Deck Operation
episodes.plot: Aoi stands at a crossroads, unsure of what she wants to do with her life. Logging into Link VRAINS as Blue Angel, she encounters Baira, the creator of the Another virus.

episodes.title: Three Draws Leading to Hope
episodes.plot: The duel between Blue Angel's Trickstar deck and Baira's Dark Mummy deck continues. Baira begins infecting Aoi's deck with virus cards while Yusaku and AI research the Another program.

episodes.title: Naoki Shima the Fighter
episodes.plot: Naoki Shima, one of Yusaku's classmates, is inspired by Playmaker and decides he wants to be a hero. With data from a Cyberse card, he logs into VRAINS to face Hanoi as Brave Max.

episodes.title: Three knights, last man
episodes.plot: Faust, a high ranking commander in the Knights of Hanoi, kidnaps Naoki to lure Playmaker into a trap. Playmaker arrives to fight Faust as a Speed Duel begins.

episodes.title: Kusanagi Report
episodes.plot: Preparing for the worst, Kusanagi writes a report detailing the battles between Playmaker and the Knights of Hanoi. Revolver then decides it's time for Hanoi's final gambit.

episodes.title: Doorway to the Abyss
episodes.plot: Despite peace having returned into Link VRAINS, Yusaku suspects something and logs in. Working with Ghost Girl, they sneak into a base and discover Revolver.

episodes.title: The Final Trigger
episodes.plot: Revolver and Ghost Girl continue their Speed Duel as Yusaku is chased by data monsters. Despite Revolver's overwhelming power, Ghost Girl fights back with all of her strength.

episodes.title: Tower of Hanoi
episodes.plot: Revolver's ultimate plan, the Tower of Hanoi, begins to absorb all the data in Link VRAINS. In 6 hours, it will detonate and delete all computer data. Yusake and his friends scramble to stop Hanoi once and for all.

episodes.title: Angel with blue tears
episodes.plot: Blue Angel encounters Specter, second in command to the Knights of Hanoi. The two begin their duel, with Specter taunting Aoi about her namesake.

episodes.title: Sacred Tree
episodes.plot: The battle between Specter and Blue Angel continues. As Specter recounts his past and how Blue Angel can't save him, she nevertheless continues to fight.

episodes.title: The Other Lost Incident
episodes.plot: Akira logs into Link VRAINS to save his sister only to be captured by Dr. Kogami, Revolver's father and the creator of the Ignis. Meanwhile, Playmaker starts a duel with Specter as a truth is revealed.

episodes.title: Pointless Justice
episodes.plot: Specter, a survivor of the Lost Incident, taunts Yusaku that his quest for revenge is pointless. His Sunavalon cards continue the swarm the field as Yusaku's hands are tied.

episodes.title: My Mother Tree
episodes.plot: With Akira being held hostage, Yusaku cannot so much against Specter's Sunavalon cards. As Kusanagi tries to free Akira, Akira comes to a decision.

episodes.title: Hanoi's Recollection
episodes.plot: Talking with his father, Revolver reflects on his past. After trying to destroy the Ignis 5 years ago, a chain of events has continued to the present day and will continue into the future.

episodes.title: Bullet Buried in Darkness
episodes.plot: As Playmaker continues towards the Tower of Hanoi, Onizuka arrives to battle Revolver. Having thrown away his charisma, Onizuka starts his brutal attack.

episodes.title: The Thirst for Victory
episodes.plot: In one turn, Revolver destroys Onizuka's entire field with Mirror Force. Despite the odds stacked against him, Onizuka continues to fight.

episodes.title: The Distorted Truth
episodes.plot: A final Speed Duel begins between Yusaku and Revolver around the Tower of Hanoi. That's when Revolver reveals the secret connection between Yusaku and Ai and the lies that Ai has told.

episodes.title: Stardust Road's Guidance
episodes.plot: Yusaku can barely hold back Revolver's attacks, combined with the debris from the Tower of Hanoi. In a pinch, Yusaku tries to enter a Data Storm as Dr. Kogami appears.

episodes.title: Birth of the Ignis
episodes.plot: Having been forcibly logged out, Yusaku goes to where Revolver is in the real world. There he explains how his father created the Ignis, the Lost Incident, and why Revolver must correct his father's mistakes.

episodes.title: Prisoner of Destiny
episodes.plot: Playmaker and Revolver each have their own missions to accomplish and will not back down. They begin their final duel in Link VRAINS as the Tower of Hanoi grows closer to completion.

episodes.title: Duel in the Extreme Domain
episodes.plot: Despite Yusaku countering Revolver's Mirror Force strategy, Revolver continues to summon powerful monster after powerful monster. Once he plays his ace card, something bad occurs.

episodes.title: The Circuit That Draws the Future
episodes.plot: The Tower of Hanoi is soon going to destroy the Internet. Revolver has created an Extra Link and completely blocked off Special Summons. Despite the overwhelming odds, Yusaku refuses to give up and draws his last card.
